==Japanese==

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|て|まえ|yomi=k}}
Compound of {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=てまえ}} elements {{compound|lang=ja|sort=てまえ|手|tr1=te|t1=hand|前|tr2=mae|t2=front}}, originally meaning “that which is just in front of one's hand”.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref><ref name="SMK5">{{R:Shinmeikai5}}</ref>

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|y=k|てまえ|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR,SMK5}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|てまえ|hhira=てまへ}}

# position that is just in [[front]] or [[before]]; in the [[nearer]] position
#: {{ja-usex|あの店は交差点の'''手前'''にある。|あの みせ は こうさてん の '''てまえ''' に ある。|That store is '''just in front of''' / '''just before''' the intersection.}}

====Pronoun====
{{ja-pos|てまえ|pronoun|hhira=てまへ}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=てまえ|vulgar|male}} [[you]], you [[son of a bitch]]

=====Usage notes=====
More commonly pronounced as and written in hiragana as {{ja-r|てめえ}}.

=====Antonyms=====
* {{sense|distant}} {{ja-r|奥|おく}}

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|て|まえ|k2=めえ|yomi=k}}
Alteration of ''temae''. The vowel shift emphasizes the [[confrontational]] sense of the term.<ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref><ref name="SMK5">{{R:Shinmeikai5}}</ref>

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|てめえ|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR,SMK5}}

====Pronoun====
{{ja-pos|てめえ|pronoun}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=てまえ|vulgar|male}} [[you]], you [[son of a bitch]]
#: {{ja-usex|'''手前'''は殺してやる！|'''てめえ''' は ころして やる！|I'm gonna kill '''you, you son of a bitch'''!}}

=====Usage notes=====
This is one of the ruder, more [[confrontational]] Japanese terms for {{m|en|you}}. Rough, often used in anger. Often pronounced and written as {{ja-r|てめえ}}.
